SELECT DISTINCT u.f_uid, u.f_user_portriat, u.f_user_nickname, u.f_user_realname, u.f_user_phonenum, a.f_gold_coin as f_balance, ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN SUM(r.f_trade_fee) IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE SUM(r.f_trade_fee) END ) FROM t_account_bill r WHERE r.f_type = 2 AND u.f_uid = r.f_uid ) AS recharge_sum, ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN SUM(r.f_trade_fee) IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE SUM(r.f_trade_fee) END ) FROM t_account_bill r WHERE r.f_type in(5,6,12,17,19) AND u.f_uid = r.f_uid ) AS withdraws_sum FROM t_user u, t_user_gold_coin a, t_account_bill r WHERE u.f_uid = a.f_uid AND u.f_uid = r.f_uid
and (u.f_user_realname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchfor}), '%') or u.f_user_phonenum LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchfor}), '%'))
ORDER BY
u.f_user_register_time ASC
u.f_user_register_time desc
LIMIT #{start},#{size}
